## CardInserted.(constructor)

Contructs a new event object.

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(reader: string, card: string);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  reader | string | a name of a card reader where the card was presented. |
|  card | string | a name of a card presented. |
